T06asmahsuu:187: yathākhyānaṃ nārthāt na cāsya yathārutamartho 'smādapi trāso na yuktaḥ /

T06asmahsuu:194: yadā pratyātmaṃ sā kathamasati tasminvyavasitiḥ // Msa_1.16 //

T06asmahsuu:226: na hi tasya śrutādanyabdalamasti tasmādaśrutvā pratikṣepo na yuktaḥ /

T06asmahsuu:4295: gṛhītā sattvapākāya saddharmasya ca dhāraṇe // Msa_18.26 //
T06asmahsuu:4297: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā cikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca /
T06asmahsuu:4305: lakṣaṇaṃ śāstrajñatāyā etānyeva pañca vastūni śrutāni bhavanti /

T06asmahsuu:4338: śamāya prāptaye teṣāṃ dhīmān satyeṣu yujyate /

T06asmahsuu:4352: sābhilāṣa[pa]sya ca prāpteḥ pratiṣedho 'tra deśitaḥ // Msa_18.32 //

T06asmahsuu:4366: paryāye lakṣaṇe vākye jñāne jñānācca tā matāḥ // Msa_18.34 //
T06asmahsuu:4369: tṛtīyā vākye pratyekaṃ janapadeṣu yā bhāṣāḥ /

T06asmahsuu:4378: deśanāyāṃ hi prayuktasya yasya ca deśanā yena ca /
T06asmahsuu:4385: vākyena deśanā tayoreva dvayoḥ sarvathā prāpaṇāt /
T06asmahsuu:4387: ato yacca yena ca deśyate tajjñānāt catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vyavasthāpitāḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4390: etena pratisaṃvidāṃ nirvacanaṃ karma ca darśitaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4391: pratyātmaṃ lokottareṇa jñānena sarvadharmasamatāṃ tathatāmavetya uttarakālaṃ tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena pravedanā paryāyādīnāṃ pratisaṃviditi nirvacanaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4400: dānaṃ śīlaṃ ca puṇyasya prajñā jñānasya saṃbhṛtiḥ /

T06asmahsuu:4406: saṃtatyā bhāvanāmetya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi /
T06asmahsuu:4407: āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vī[dhī]re sarvārthasādhakaḥ // Msa_18.40 //
T06asmahsuu:4440: kathaṃ prāptitaḥ kāyādīnāṃ na visaṃyogāya nāvisaṃyogāya /

T06asmahsuu:4461: manaskārasya ca tyāge praveśe caiva bhūmiṣu // Msa_18.46 //

T06asmahsuu:4464: kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca /

T06asmahsuu:4487: chandaṃ hi niśritya śamathavipaśyanākhyaṃ yogaṃ bhāvayatīti vyāyacchate /

T06asmahsuu:4498: eṣā yogabhāvanā yathoktaprabhedeṣu sarvasamyakprahāṇeṣu pratipakṣa ucyate /
T06asmahsuu:4502: sarvārthasiddhau jāyante ātmanaśca parasya ca // Msa_18.50 //
T06asmahsuu:4516: aṣṭānāṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ chando vyāyāmaḥ śraddhā vyāvasāyikaḥ upāyaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4527: tatra darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ pañcavidhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ dīvyaṃ cakṣuḥ āryaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ dharmacakṣuḥ buddhacakṣuśca /
T06asmahsuu:4529: tābhirupasaṃkramya bhāṣāṃ cittaṃ cāgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca viditvā niḥsaraṇāyāvavadanāt /
T06asmahsuu:4530: sthitivikriḍitaṃ yasmāt bodhisattvānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ nirmāṇādibhiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4531: praṇidhiryena praṇidhijñānena praṇidhānabalikā bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanti /
T06asmahsuu:4532: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya vā prabhāyā vā svarasya veti vistareṇa yathā daśabhūmike sūtre /
T06asmahsuu:4533: vaśitā yathā tatraiva daśa vaśitā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4553: etena yasyāmavasthāyāṃ yasyāvabodhāt bodhyaṅgāni vyavasthāpyante tadupadiṣṭaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4554: bhūmipraviṣṭāvasthāyāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca samatāvabodhādyathākramaṃ dharmanairātmyenātmaparasamatayā ca /
T06asmahsuu:4564: dharmālokavivṛddhyā ca prītyā āpūryate dhruvam // Msa_18.59 //
T06asmahsuu:4566: tataḥ prītiḥ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ[yaṃ] sadā prīṇayati /
T06asmahsuu:4576: upekṣocyate nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ tayā bodhisattvaḥ sarvatra yathākāmaṃ viharati /
T06asmahsuu:4582: tatra ca gatvā vāsaṃ kalpayati yatrākhinnaḥ caturaṅgo bālakāyaḥ paraiti /
T06asmahsuu:4594: yena yanniśritya yo 'saṃkleśa iti trividhamasaṃkleśāṅgaṃ veditavyam /
T06asmahsuu:4602: tadvyavasthāne ca sūtrādike bhagavatā kṛte sa eva praveśastena tadarthāvabodhāt /

T06asmahsuu:4606: ca vaiśeṣikaguṇāvaraṇasya ca samyagvyāyāmena dīrghaṃ hi kālam akhidyamāno jñeyāvaraṇasya
T06asmahsuu:4609: samyaksamādhinā vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatyevamaṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante /
T06asmahsuu:4614: dharmāṇāṃ ca pravicayādyathākramaṃ śamatho vipaśyanā ca veditavyā /

T06asmahsuu:4625: prativedhe ca niryāṇe animitte hyasaṃskṛte // Msa_18.67 //
T06asmahsuu:4627: sarvabhūmigatā dhīre sa yogaḥ sarvasādhakaḥ // Msa_18.68 //
T06asmahsuu:4628: ityupaniṣanmatetyevamādinā śamathavipaśyanāyāḥ prabhedaḥ karma ca nirdiṣṭaṃ /

T06asmahsuu:4641: kṣipraprāptau kriyāśuddhau vartmācchede ca kauśalaṃ // Msa_18.69 //
T06asmahsuu:4648: kṣiprābhisaṃbodhe sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yāvad bhavatu me jñānaṃ saṃbodhāyeti pratideśanānumodanādhyeṣaṇā pariṇāmanā /
T06asmahsuu:4652: asmin pañcavidha upāye sarvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāmasamaṃ tadanyaiḥ kauśalamityayaṃ prabhedaḥ /

T06asmahsuu:4660: prakāśayanti saddharmaṃ nityaṃ saṃdhārayanti ca // Msa_18.73 //
T06asmahsuu:4661: atrāpi prabhedaḥ karma ca dhāraṇyāḥ saṃdarśitaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4670: abhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ mṛdvī bhūmipraviṣṭānām aśuddhabhūmikānāṃ madhyā saptasu bhūmiṣu /
T06asmahsuu:4671: pariśuddhabhūmikā tvadhimātrā śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu ityayaṃ prabhedo dhāraṇyāḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4674: cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat /
T06asmahsuu:4676: hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittātsadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat /
T06asmahsuu:4680: atra praṇidhānaṃ svabhāvato nidānato bhūmitaḥ prabhedataḥ karmataśca paridīpitaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4686: āyatyāṃ vā[cā]bhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ cittātpunaḥ sadyaḥphalaṃ cittamātrāt yathābhipretārthasamṛddhitā[to] /
T06asmahsuu:4689: yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya veti vistaraḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4702: trividhaśca grāhyasya gocarasya grāhakā ye samādhayaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4703: te śūnyatādisamādhayaḥ iti grāhyagrāhakabhāvena trayaḥ samādhayo jñātavyāḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4718: tatra sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhāḥ ityapraṇihitasya samādherūpaniṣadbhāvena deśitaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4729: evaśabdenāvadhāraṇaṃ parikalpita ātmā nāsti parikalpamātraṃ tvastīti parikalpitalakṣaṇasyābhāvārtho 'nātmārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
T06asmahsuu:4737: tatra kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskṛtamiti paścādvacanadiyaṃ pratijñā veditavyā /
T06asmahsuu:4742: atha kālāntaraṃ sthitvā pūrvottaranirodhotpādataḥ prabandheneṣyate vṛttiḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4744: naiva cotpannasya vinā prabandhena kālāntaraṃ bhāvo yujyate /
T06asmahsuu:4747: tadyadi bhūtvā punaruttarakālaṃ bhavati tasyāvaśyaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4749: na ca tattenaiva hetunā bhavitumarhati tasyopayu[bhu]ktahetukatvāt /
T06asmahsuu:4752: evaṃ vinā prabandhenotpannasya kālāntaraṃ bhāvo na yujyate /
T06asmahsuu:4753: athāpyevamiṣyeta notpannaṃ punarutpadyate yadarthaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ syādutpannaṃ tu kālāntareṇa paścānnirudhyate notpannamātrameveti /
T06asmahsuu:4764: māyopamāste bhikṣo saṃskārā āpāyikāstāvatkālikā itvarapratyupasthāyina iti /
T06asmahsuu:4766: te hi saṃskārāṇāmudayavyayau manasikurvantaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyanti /
T06asmahsuu:4767: anyathā hi teṣāmapi nirvidvirāgavimuktayo na syuryathānyeṣāṃ maraṇakālādiṣu nirodhaṃ paśyatāṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4768: yadi cotpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kālāntaraṃ tiṣṭhet sa svayameva vā tiṣṭhetsvayameva sthātuṃ samarthaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4773: kena vā so 'nte punaḥ sthātuṃ na samarthaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4777: labdhe tu vināśakāraṇe paścādvinaśyati agnimeva śyāmateti /
T06asmahsuu:4783: tathā hi tatsaṃbandhāt śyāmatāyāḥ saṃtatirvisadṛśī gṛhyate na tu sarvathaivāpravṛttiḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4791: athāpi syātpratikṣaṇamapūrvotpattau tadevedamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ na syāditi /
T06asmahsuu:4799: tadyadi nādita evārabdhaṃ bhavedādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānāmante pariṇāmo nopalabhyeta /
T06asmahsuu:4800: tasmādādita evānyathātvamārabdhaṃ yatkrameṇābhivardhamānamante vyaktimāpadyate kṣīrasyeva dadyavasthāyāṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4809: kṣaṇikaṃ hi cittaṃ prasiddhaṃ tasya cānye saṃskārāścakṣurūpādayo hetutaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4811: na tvakṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikaṃ bhavitumarhati yathā nityādanityamiti /
T06asmahsuu:4815: cittena hi sarve saṃskārāścakṣurādayaḥ sādhiṣṭhānā upāttāḥ sahasaṃmurchanāḥ tadanugrahānuvṛttitaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4819: cittenāyaṃ loko nīyate cittena parikṛṣyate cittasyotpannasyotpannasya vaśe vartate iti /
T06asmahsuu:4823: śuddhaṃ hi yogināṃ cittaṃ saṃskārā anuvartante /
T06asmahsuu:4825: dhyāyī bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścittavaśe prāpta imaṃ dāruskandhaṃ sacet suvarṇamadhimucyate tadapyasya tathaiva (MSA_Bagchi 145) syāditi /
T06asmahsuu:4828: tathā hi pāpakāriṣu sattveṣu bāhyā bhāvā hīnā bhavanti /
T06asmahsuu:4832: na hi kṣaṇikasyākṣaṇikaṃ phalaṃ yujyate tadanuvidhāyitvāt /
T06asmahsuu:4833: evaṃ tāvadaviśeṣeṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ sādhitam /
T06asmahsuu:4834: ādhyātmikānāṃ punaḥ sādhanārthaṃ pañca ślokā veditavyāḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4856: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu paranirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ cittamātrādhīnatvāt /
T06asmahsuu:4861: pratibimbatvena yo aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyināṃ samādhivaśena pratibimbānāṃ[khyānāṃ] saṃskārāṇāmutpādaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4862: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyāmutpattāvādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumānaviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇairveditavyam /
T06asmahsuu:4864: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt taduttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtteruttarottaraviśeṣo (MSA_Bagchi 146)
T06asmahsuu:4869: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinānyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet /
T06asmahsuu:4874: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4876: na hi tiṣṭhatyāśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate /
T06asmahsuu:4877: yāne tiṣṭhati tadārūḍhānavasthānavadanyathā hyāśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet /
T06asmahsuu:4881: na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāvavināśe satyante vikārābhāvāt /
T06asmahsuu:4882: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau /
T06asmahsuu:4883: na hi tathāsthiteṣveva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syādutpattiḥ sugatau vā /
T06asmahsuu:4889: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatirnāma kācit kriyā yujyate /
T06asmahsuu:4890: sā hyutpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayedanutpannā vā /
T06asmahsuu:4891: yadyutpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcidgata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate /
T06asmahsuu:4892: athānutpannā tenāsatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate /
T06asmahsuu:4893: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate /
T06asmahsuu:4897: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārādanyopalabhyate /
T06asmahsuu:4906: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyostiryaggamanamagnerūrdhvaṃ jvalanamapāṃ nimne syandanaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4911: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvamantareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasminkāle punarbījabhāvo yujyate /
T06asmahsuu:4922: śoṣavṛddheḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaḥ // Msa_18.89 //
T06asmahsuu:4931: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍivadhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate /
T06asmahsuu:4941: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle /
T06asmahsuu:4948: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇamanyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt /
T06asmahsuu:4951: na hi tejasyutpanne tejaḥ sahotpannamindhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate /
T06asmahsuu:4952: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4955: śabdaḥ punaryo 'pi kālāntaramupalabhyate ghaṇṭādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4957: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddhameva cittānuvṛtteryathā pūrvamuktaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4964: yadyevaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇamanya[nitya]tvasyāgrahaṇāditi sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:4971: dvividhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
T06asmahsuu:4972: tadyadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyamabhipretamata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate /
T06asmahsuu:4973: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaurvā goriti /
T06asmahsuu:4974: atha vṛttivailakṣaṇyamata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpādīnāṃ prasiddhatvāt /
T06asmahsuu:4979: cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tadāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate /
T06asmahsuu:4980: yadyevaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avasthānamiti /
T06asmahsuu:4982: na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatteriti /
T06asmahsuu:4983: yadyevaṃ vadet sati kṣaṇikattve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmātpradīpādiva kṣaṇiakatvaṃ na siddhamiti /
T06asmahsuu:4987: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāttadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punarvyavadānamityevaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:4989: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /

T06asmahsuu:5014: pudgala kimastīti vaktavyo nāstīti vaktavyaḥ / āha /
T06asmahsuu:5015: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
T06asmahsuu:5016: yataśca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5020: na hi sa dravyata upalabhyate rūpādivat /
T06asmahsuu:5022: na ca pudgalaṃ buddhyā na pratipadyante pudgalavādinaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5024: dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānamupalabhate prajñāpayatīti kathaṃ nopalabdho bhavati /
T06asmahsuu:5025: na sa evamupalabhyamāno dravyata upalabdho bhavati /
T06asmahsuu:5027: viparyāsāt tathā hyanātmanyātmeti viparyāsa ukto bhagavatā /
T06asmahsuu:5031: satkāyadṛṣṭikleśalakṣaṇo hyeṣa saṃkleśo yaduta ahaṃ mameti /
T06asmahsuu:5033: na[sa] caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:5036: yatra punarvastuni rūpādisaṃjñakeprajñaptiḥ pudgala iti tasmātkimekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvidanyetvena / āha /
T06asmahsuu:5043: ekatve hi skandhānāmātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasattvaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:5047: ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanamatikramya pudgalasya dravyato 'stitvamicchanti ta idaṃ syurvacanīyāḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5056: ekatvenānyatvena ca agnirhi nāma tejodhāturindhanaṃ śeṣāṇi bhūtāni /
T06asmahsuu:5058: loke ca vināpyagninā dṛṣṭamindhanaṃ kāṣṭhādi vināpi cendhanenāgniriti siddhamanyatvaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:5061: upalabdhestathā hi vāyunā vikṣiptaṃ dūramapi jvalatparaiti /
T06asmahsuu:5066: astyeva pudgalo ya eṣa draṣṭā yāvadvijñātā kartā bhoktā jñātā moktā ca /
T06asmahsuu:5069: sa hi darśānādisaṃjñakānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayabhāvena vā kartā bhavet svāmitvena vā /
T06asmahsuu:5074: na hi tasya tatra kiṃcitsāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:5076: sa hi vijñānapravṛttau svāmībhavannani[bhavanni]ṣṭaṃ vijñānamanityaṃ na pravartayet /
T06asmahsuu:5098: api khalu pudgalo draṣṭā bhavan yāvadvijñātā darśanādiṣu saprayatno vā bhavenniṣprayatno vā /
T06asmahsuu:5099: saprayatnasya vā punarasau prayatnaḥ svayaṃbhūrvā bhavedākasmikaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5105: niṣprayatnasya vā punaḥ sataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
T06asmahsuu:5107: ityasati vyāpāre pudgalasya darśanādau kathamasau draṣṭā bhavati /
T06asmahsuu:5112: yadi darśanādiṣu prayatna ākasmiko yato darśanādīni /
T06asmahsuu:5113: na tarhi teṣāṃ pudgalaḥ karteti kathamasau draṣṭā bhavati yāvadvijñātā sati vākasmikatve nirapekṣatvāt na kadācitprayatno na syādanityo na syāt
T06asmahsuu:5114: nitye ca prayatne darśanādīnāṃ yugapacca nityaṃ ca pravṛttiḥ syāditi doṣaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5119: tasya tathā sthitasya pratyayatvaṃ na yujyate /
T06asmahsuu:5121: sati hi tatpratyayatve na kadācitpudgalo nāstīti /
T06asmahsuu:5122: kimarthaṃ prāk prayatno na syādyadā notpannaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5124: (MSA_Bagchi 152) tṛtīyaśca kaścitpakṣo nāsti yanna sthito na vinaṣṭaḥ syāditi /

T06asmahsuu:5130: karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhānpratisaṃdadhāti /
T06asmahsuu:5135: śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate nādhimucyate /
T06asmahsuu:5138: pudgalo 'pi hi bhagavatā tatra tatra deśitaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5139: parijñātāvī bhārahāraḥ śraddhānusāryādipudgalavyavasthānata ityasati dravyato 'stitve kasmāddeśitaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5143: pudgalaprajñaptimantareṇa tadvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaśca deśayituṃ na śakyaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5144: tatra parijñāsūtre parijñeyā dharmāḥ saṃkleśaḥ parijñā vyavadānaṃ /
T06asmahsuu:5148: tayorvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaścāntareṇa parijñātāvibhārahārapudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ /
T06asmahsuu:5150: teṣāṃ vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaścāntareṇa śraddhānusāryādipudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ /
T06asmahsuu:5151: yenāsati dravyato 'stitve pudgalo deśita ityayamatra nayo veditavyaḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5161: tathā hi sarveṣāṃ na dṛṣṭasatyānāmātmadarśanaṃ vidyate /
T06asmahsuu:5163: na hi pūrvamātmānamanātmato gṛhītvā satyābhisamayakāle kaścidātmato gṛhṇāti /
T06asmahsuu:5164: (MSA_Bagchi 153) yathā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhataḥ pūrvamagṛhītvā paścādgṛhṇātīti yathāpūrvaṃ tathā paścādapi mokṣo na syāt /
T06asmahsuu:5165: sati cātmanyavaśyamahaṃkāramamakārābhyāmātmatṛṣṇayā cānyaiśca tannidānaiḥ kleśairbhavitavyamiti ato 'pi mokṣo na syāt /

T06asmahsuu:5212: sthāpanā bhājanatve ca śīleṣveva ca ropaṇaṃ /

T06asmahsuu:5217: dānena hi sattvānāṃ bhājanatve sthāpayanti kuśalakriyāyāḥ /
T06asmahsuu:5251: anarhadeśanāṃ ye ca sattvānāṃ gūhayanti hi /

T06asmahsuu:5265: yacchanti laukikīṃ kṛtsnāṃ saṃpadaṃ cātilaukikīm // Msa_19.16 //
T06asmahsuu:5266: sukhe hite cābhinnā[akheditvādabhinnā] ye sadā sukhahitaiṣiṇaḥ /

T06asmahsuu:5373: kṣetreṇa nāmnā kālena kalpanāmnā ca tatpunaḥ /

T06asmahsuu:5488: purataḥ sthāpitaṃ yacca nimittaṃ yatsthitaṃ svayaṃ /

T06asmahsuu:5507: tasyaiva kṣayāya saṃvartate dauṣṭhulyakāyasyālayavijñānasya tatkṣayārthaṃ tatkṣaye /

T06asmahsuu:5515: sattārthe ca tathatāyāmasattārthe ca nimitte pratyakṣaṃ vikalpavibhu cocyate /
